long_description: The expedition-size Black Diamond Mission 75 pack hauls all the gear you need for high-mountain climbing adventures. Plus, its fine-tuned suspension offers impressive freedom of movement. Lightweight reACTIV(TM) XP suspension offers great mobility, support and stability for scrambling and climbing. Fixed shoulder straps and vented, thermoformed back panel offer breathable comfort. Removable, padded hipbelt with fixed 38mm webbing belt disperses load weight comfortably around your hips. Top-loading main compartment features removable floating top lid and a tuck-away rope strap. Hydration-compatible design features a reservoir sleeve and drink tube exit port (reservoir sold separately). PickPockets(TM) tool attachment, 3-point haul system and welded crampon patch accommodate climbing gear; side compression straps shrink extra volume and stabilize your load. Black Diamond Mission 75 pack is made of tough ripstop nylon.
short_description: The expedition-size Black Diamond Mission 75 pack hauls all the gear you need for high-mountain climbing adventures. Plus, its fine-tuned suspension offers impressive freedom of movement.
